Name: Acid Splash
Summary: You splash a glob of acid that splatters your target and nearby creatures.

Name: Approximate
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Magically estimate the number of nearby objects.

Name: Boost Eidolon
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and boost the power of your eidolon's attacks.

Name: Bullhorn
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Magnify your voice to be heard at a distance.

Name: Buzzing Bites
Source: Monsters of Myth
Summary: You evoke buzzing and crawling insects to climb onto a foe's body and bite.

Name: Chill Touch
Summary: Your touch hurts the living or disorients undead.

Name: Clinging Ice
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Freezing sleet and heavy snowfall collect on the target's feet and legs, dealing 1d4 cold damage and other effects depending on its Reflex save.

Name: Dancing Lights
Summary: Create four floating lights you can move.

Name: Daze
Summary: Damage a creature's mind and possibly stun it.

Name: Detect Magic
Summary: Sense whether magic is nearby.

Name: Discern Secrets
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You call upon your patron's power to better uncover secrets.

Name: Disrupt Undead
Summary: Damage undead with positive energy.

Name: Distortion Lens
Summary: You create a magical lens that distorts space as best suits you.

Name: Divine Lance
Summary: Throw divine energy that damages based on your deity's alignment.

Name: Electric Arc
Summary: Zap one or two creatures with lightning.

Name: Evil Eye
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Traits: Cantrip, Curse, Emotion, Enchantment, Fear, Hex, Mental, Witch
Summary: Your fix your eye on the target, imposing a malevolent hex.

Name: Forbidden Thought
Summary: You place a psychic lock in a foe's mind that prevents it from a specific action.

Name: Forbidding Ward
Summary: Protect an ally against one specific enemy.

Name: Gale Blast
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Damage and push adjacent creatures with air.

Name: Ghost Sound
Summary: Make false sounds.

Name: Glimpse Weakness
Summary: You glimpse a loose scale, a seam in a foe's armor, or a similar weakness, aiding your allies in landing a precise hit.

Name: Gouging Claw
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Morph your limb into a claw and attack with it.

Name: Guidance
Summary: Divine guidance improves one roll.

Name: Haunting Hymn
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: A powerful hymn harms and deafens.

Name: Healing Plaster
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Transform mud into a healing plaster to treat wounds without healer's tools.

Name: Imaginary Weapon
Summary: You create a simple weapon of force.

Name: Infectious Enthusiasm
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Encourage yourself and an ally to improve one roll apiece.

Name: Inside Ropes
Summary: You pull a large handful of guts from your midsection.

Name: Inspire Competence
Summary: Your encouragement inspires your ally to succeed at a task.

Name: Inspire Courage
Summary: You inspire your allies with words or tunes of encouragement.

Name: Invoke True Name
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You speak the true name of a creature to more surely affect it with your magic.

Name: Join Pasts
Summary: Share thoughts and experiences with allies.

Name: Know Direction
Summary: Find true north.

Name: Light
Summary: Make an object glow.

Name: Mage Hand
Summary: Command a floating hand to move an object.

Name: Message
Summary: Speak a message to a distant creature, who can reply.

Name: Nudge Fate
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You read slightly into the future and give fate a tiny push to achieve the result you desire.

Name: Pact Broker
Summary: You offer to broker a pact of peace.

Name: Phase Bolt
Summary: Fire a spike of magic that can pass through shields and cover

Name: Prestidigitation
Summary: Perform a minor magical trick.

Name: Produce Flame
Summary: Kindle small flames to attack close or at range.

Name: Protect Companion
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Shield your eidolon or minion from harm.

Name: Puff of Poison
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Exhale toxins to poison a foe.

Name: Ray of Frost
Summary: Damage a creature with cold.

Name: Read Aura
Summary: Detect if an object is magical, and determine the school of its magic.

Name: Read the Air
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Pick up societal cues.

Name: Reinforce Eidolon
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and reinforce your eidolon's defenses.

Name: Scatter Scree
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Evoke rocks to deal bludgeoning damage and make rocky difficult terrain.

Name: Shield
Summary: A shield of magical force blocks attacks and magic missiles.

Name: Shroud of Night
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Drawing your hand in a sweeping gesture, you shroud the target in a veil of night.

Name: Sigil
Summary: Leave a magical mark.

Name: Silver's Refrain
Summary: Make weapons silver and impede a devil's teleportation.

Name: Song of Strength
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation.

Name: Spirit Object
Summary: Using a sliver of Baba Yaga's power, you briefly bring an object to life.

Name: Spout
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Batter creatures with a water blast that is larger if cast in a body of water.

Name: Stabilize
Summary: Stabilize a dying creature.

Name: Stoke the Heart
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Intense fervor fills the target creature, empowering their blows.

Name: Summon Instrument
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Conjure a musical instrument.

Name: Tame
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Make a domesticated animal friendlier to you.

Name: Tanglefoot
Summary: Conjure a vine to entangle a creature.

Name: Telekinetic Projectile
Summary: Fling an object at a creature.

Name: Telekinetic Rend
Summary: Your mind creates a violent axis of motion in a nearby space.

Name: Thermal Stasis
Summary: The same abilities that let you raise or lower thermal energy also let you keep it at a safe medium.

Name: Time Sense
Summary: Know perfectly what time it is

Name: Warp Step
Summary: Contract space to cover more ground when you move

Name: Wash Your Luck
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Ignore misfortune once.

Name: Wilding Word
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: With a few words, you convince a wild creature you are a kindred spirit, making it reluctant to harm you.

Name: Inspire Defense
Summary: You inspire your allies to protect themselves more effectively.

Name: Triple Time
Summary: You dance at a lively tempo, speeding your allies’ movement.

Name: Astral Rain
Summary: You fling a mass of furious thoughts into the air, where they expand into numerous blades or other shapes that rain down.

Name: Dirge of Doom
Summary: Frighten nearby enemies.

Name: Entropic Wheel
Summary: You stockpile thermal energy in a magical wheel-like construct that lets you burn opponents with cold or freeze their bodies with heat.

Name: Ghostly Shift
Summary: Your body becomes insubstantial as you partially phase out.

Name: Omnidirectional Scan
Summary: You quickly view your surroundings from a variety of angles, your senses constructing an overall mental picture.

Name: Shatter Mind
Summary: You telepathically assail the minds of your foes.

Name: Song of Marching
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You maintain a brisk performance that keeps allies on the move.

Name: Vector Screen
Summary: You set up a transparent, rippling screen of telekinetic energy that seizes small, fast-moving projectiles.

Name: Contagious Idea
Summary: Nothing is so contagious as a thought.

Name: Dancing Blade
Summary: You telekinetically animate a weapon that's unattended or on your person.

Name: Foresee the Path
Summary: You see just a split second into the future and glean how an enemy will move, making it easier for your allies to strike it mid-action.

Name: Hologram Cage
Summary: You weave light into a cube of vivid and fantastic patterns.

Name: House of Imaginary Walls
Summary: You mime creating an invisible stretch of wall adjacent to you and within your reach.

Name: Redistribute Potential
Summary: Energy attempts to balance out, but with your magic, you can shunt all the energy in one area to another.

Name: Tesseract Tunnel
Summary: You race from point to point, tearing open a tunnel in space.

Name: Allegro
Summary: You perform rapidly, speeding up your ally.

Name: Acidic Burst
Summary: You create a shell of acid around yourself that immediately bursts outward.

Name: Adapt Self
Summary: You make subtle changes to yourself to adapt to the situation.

Name: Admonishing Ray
Summary: A ray of energy bludgeons your target into submission without causing lasting harm.

Name: Agile Feet
Summary: The blessings of your god make your feet faster and your movements more fluid.

Name: Agitate
Summary: You send the target’s mind and body into overdrive, forcing it to become restless and hyperactive.

Name: Air Bubble
Summary: React to create air for a creature to breathe.

Name: Airburst
Summary: A blast of wind wildly pushes everything nearby.

Name: Alarm
Summary: Be alerted if a creature enters a warded area.

Name: Ancestral Memories
Summary: The memories of long-dead spellcasters grant you knowledge in a specific skill.

Name: Ancestral Touch
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You touch a creature and force them to see and feel the ancestors surrounding you.

Name: Angelic Halo
Summary: You gain an angelic halo with an aura that increases allies’ healing from the heal spell.

Name: Animal Allies
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Summon animals to briefly attack adjacent foes.

Name: Animate Dead
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Animate an undead creature to fight on your behalf.

Name: Animate Rope
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Command a rope to move and tie as you wish.

Name: Ant Haul
Summary: Target can carry more.

Name: Anticipate Peril
Summary: You grant the target brief foresight.

Name: Appearance of Wealth
Summary: You create a brief vision of immense wealth filling the spell’s area.

Name: Athletic Rush
Summary: Your body fills with physical power and skill.

Name: Augment Summoning
Summary: You augment the abilities of a summoned creature.

Name: Bane
Summary: Weaken enemies' attacks in an aura around you.

Name: Befuddle
Summary: You sow seeds of confusion in your target’s mind, causing their actions and thoughts to become clumsy.

Name: Bit of Luck
Summary: You tilt the scales of luck slightly to protect a creature from disaster.

Name: Biting Words
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Hurl sonic taunts to hurt creatures.

Name: Bless
Summary: Strengthen allies' attacks in an aura around you.

Name: Blind Ambition
Summary: You strengthen a target’s ambition, increase its resentment of allies, and make its allegiances more susceptible to change.

Name: Blood Ward
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You consolidate warding energies with a gesture, guarding a creature against attacks from a certain type of foe.

Name: Brain Drain
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You probe the target's mind to glean knowledge.

Name: Breadcrumbs
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Make a trail behind a creature.

Name: Buffeting Winds
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Summary: You release a quick burst of wind that batters your living opponents without causing them lasting harm, while also blowing undead away.

Name: Burning Hands
Summary: A small cone of flame rushes from your hands.

Name: Cackle
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: With a quick burst of laughter, you prolong a magical effect you created.

Name: Call of the Grave
Summary: You fire a ray of sickening energy.

Name: Call to Arms
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You cry out a call to arms, inspiring your allies to enter the fray.

Name: Charged Javelin
Summary: You fire a javelin of electricity that leaves a charged field around its target.

Name: Charm
Summary: A creature becomes more friendly to you.

Name: Charming Touch
Summary: You infuse your target with attraction, causing it to act friendlier toward you.

Name: Charming Words
Summary: You whisper enchanting words to deflect your foe’s ire.

Name: Chilling Spray
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Icy shards fly out from you in a cone.

Name: Cinder Gaze
Summary: You've learned to read the future in the patterns of flames and smoke.

Name: Cloak of Shadow
Summary: You drape the target in a mantle of swirling shadows that make it harder to see.

Name: Color Spray
Summary: Swirling colors dazzle or stun creatures.

Name: Command
Summary: Bid a creature to approach, run, release something, lie prone, or stand up.

Name: Concordant Choir
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Damage foes with music.

Name: Counter Performance
Summary: Use Performance to counter a visual or auditory effect.

Name: Create Water
Summary: Conjure 2 gallons of water.

Name: Crushing Ground
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You tear open the ground then slam it shut.

Name: Cry of Destruction
Summary: Your voice booms, smashing what’s in front of you.

Name: Dazzling Flash
Summary: You raise your religious symbol and create a blinding flash of light.

Name: Death's Call
Summary: Seeing another pass from this world to the next invigorates you.

Name: Déjà Vu
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Make a creature do the same thing again.

Name: Delay Consequence
Summary: You transpose the moment that the target would be injured to later in its timestream.

Name: Detect Alignment
Summary: See auras of a chosen alignment.

Name: Detect Poison
Summary: Determine whether an object or creature is poisonous or venomous.

Name: Diabolic Edict
Summary: You issue a diabolic edict, demanding the target perform a particular task and offering rewards for its fulfillment.

Name: Dim the Light
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You magnify the darkness from the triggering effect, causing the ambient light level to flicker briefly so you can slip from sight.

Name: Dimensional Assault
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You tumble through space, making a short dimensional hop to better position yourself for an attack.

Name: Disrupting Weapons
Summary: Weapons deal positive damage to undead.

Name: Divine Plagues
Summary: Your deity sends wracking plagues.

Name: Diviner's Sight
Summary: You glimpse into the target’s future.

Name: Draconic Barrage
Summary: You shape energy into one incorporeal tiny dragon that flits around you.

Name: Dragon Claws
Summary: Vicious claws grow from your fingers.

Name: Draw Ire
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Mentally sting a creature's mind to make it less capable of attacking creatures other than you.

Name: Echoing Weapon
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Your attacks build up to release a sonic pulse.

Name: Efficient Apport
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Walking over to an item to pick it up is so much effort.

Name: Eject Soul
Summary: Your touch disrupts the connection between body and soul, possibly forcing the soul out of the body altogether.

Name: Elemental Betrayal
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You call upon the elements to undermine your foe.

Name: Elemental Toss
Summary: With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe.

Name: Empty Inside
Summary: You inject a sliver of the void into your mind, momentarily remaking it into a bleak and empty place.

Name: Endure
Summary: You invigorate the touched creature’s mind and urge it to press on.

Name: Evolution Surge
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You flood your eidolon with power, creating a temporary evolution in your eidolon's capabilities.

Name: Exchange Image
Summary: Trade appearances with the target.

Name: Extend Boost
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You focus on the intricacies of the magic binding you to your eidolon to extend the duration of your boost eidolon or reinforce eidolon spell.

Name: Face in the Crowd
Summary: While in a crowd of roughly similar creatures, your appearance becomes bland and nondescript.

Name: Faerie Dust
Summary: You sprinkle magical dust in the spell’s area, making those within easier to trick.

Name: Fear
Summary: Frighten a creature, possibly making it flee.

Name: Feather Fall
Summary: React to slow a creature’s fall.

Name: Fire Ray
Summary: A blazing band of fire arcs through the air.

Name: Fleet Step
Summary: Make your Speed much faster.

Name: Floating Disk
Summary: A disk of energy follows you, carrying objects.

Name: Force Bolt
Summary: You fire an unerring dart of force from your fingertips.

Name: Force Fang
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You briefly turn your attack into pure force to bypass your opponent's defenses.

Name: Forced Mercy
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Summary: You soften the target's blows, ensuring they avoid vital areas and cause no lasting harm.

Name: Forced Quiet
Summary: You quiet the target’s voice, preventing it from giving away valuable secrets.

Name: Frenzied Revelry
Summary: You recall memories of hedonistic rites to send yourself into an infectious frenzy, dancing and howling wildly to encourage your companions to join in.

Name: Friendfetch
Summary: You shoot out ephemeral, telekinetic strands that drag each target directly toward you, stopping in the closest unoccupied space to you in this path.

Name: Genie's Veil
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: With a flourish, you fulfill a creature's wish for protection, bending reality to keep them from harm.

Name: Glutton's Jaw
Summary: Your mouth transforms into a shadowy maw bristling with pointed teeth.

Name: Goblin Pox
Summary: Infect a creature with goblin pox.

Name: Goodberry
Summary: You imbue the target berry with the bounty of nature, allowing it to heal and sustain far beyond its normal capacity.

Name: Gravitational Pull
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Pull one or more creatures towards you using gravity.

Name: Gravity Weapon
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You build up gravitational force and funnel it into your blows, leading to more powerful attacks with blade and bow alike.

Name: Grease
Summary: Coat a surface or object in slippery grease.

Name: Grim Tendrils
Summary: Creatures in a line take negative damage and bleed.

Name: Gritty Wheeze
Source: Threshold of Knowledge
Summary: You exhale desiccating grit and sand in a small cloud.

Name: Gust of Wind
Summary: Wind blows out fires and knocks back objects and creatures.

Name: Hallowed Ground
Source: Book of the Dead
Summary: One small space becomes inhospitable to undead as you fill it with life-infused benevolent magic.

Name: Hand of the Apprentice
Summary: You hurl a held melee weapon, making a spell attack roll.

Name: Harm
Summary: Negative energy harms the living or heals the undead, either a single creature or all in a burst.

Name: Heal
Summary: Positive energy heals the living or harms the undead, either a single creature or all in a burst.

Name: Heal Animal
Summary: You heal an animal’s wounds.

Name: Heal Companion
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You harness positive energy to heal your animal companion's wounds.

Name: Healer's Blessing
Summary: Your words bless a creature with an enhanced connection to positive energy.

Name: Hollow Heart
Summary: You stoke the target's ambition beyond reason, until it believes no one is capable of helping it, or that others aren't to be trusted.

Name: Horizon Thunder Sphere
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Gather energy and throw a ball of lightning.

Name: Hurtling Stone
Summary: You evoke a magical stone and throw it, with your god’s presence guiding your aim.

Name: Hydraulic Push
Summary: Damage and push a creature with a blast of water.

Name: Hymn of Healing
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Your divine singing mends wounds and provides a temporary respite from harm.

Name: Hyperfocus
Summary: You sharpen a creature’s senses, though more distant objects become hazy, indistinct, or muted to it.

Name: Ill Omen
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Curse a creature with misfortune.

Name: Illusory Disguise
Summary: Make yourself look like a different creature.

Name: Illusory Object
Summary: Form a convincing illusion of an object.

Name: Imprint Message
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Put a false psychic imprint on an object.

Name: Incendiary Aura
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You surround yourself with a combustible aura.

Name: Invisible Item
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Make an item disappear from view.

Name: Item Facade
Summary: Disguise an item to look perfect or shoddy.

Name: Jealous Hex
Summary: You draw forth a hag’s innate jealousy to deny a target its greatest attribute.

Name: Jump
Summary: Make an impressive leap.

Name: Juvenile Companion
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Turn your companion into its juvenile form.

Name: Ki Rush
Summary: Accelerated by your ki, you move with such speed you become a blur.

Name: Ki Strike
Summary: You focus your ki into magical attacks.

Name: Kinetic Ram
Summary: Use waves of force to push enemies back

Name: Lament
Summary: You let out your negative emotions in a guttural wail that shakes your enemies’ hearts.

Name: Lay on Hands
Summary: Your hands become infused with positive energy, healing a living creature or damaging an undead creature with a touch.

Name: Liberating Command
Summary: You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place.

Name: Life Boost
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You temporarily bolster the target's vitality.

Name: Life Link
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You forge a connection of life energy between you and your target, distributing harm between both of you.

Name: Lift Nature's Caul
Source: Pathfinder #165
Summary: With a wave of the hand, you cause the targets to see the world around them as if a gauzy lm had been lifted away to expose the truth that lies below their perceived reality.

Name: Lingering Composition
Summary: You add a flourish to your composition to extend its benefits.

Name: Lock
Summary: Make a lock hard to open.

Name: Longstrider
Summary: Increase your Speed for an hour.

Name: Loremaster's Etude
Summary: You call upon your muse’s deep mysteries, granting the target a greater ability to think and recall information.

Name: Lose the Path
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: React to impede and possibly divert a Stride.

Name: Mage Armor
Summary: Ward yourself with magical armor.

Name: Magic Aura
Summary: Change how an item's magic appears to detecting spells.

Name: Magic Fang
Summary: Make a creature's unarmed attacks magical temporarily.

Name: Magic Hide
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Your animal companion grows a thicker hide, matted fur, or a harder shell, granting it a +1 status bonus to AC.

Name: Magic Missile
Summary: Pelt creatures with unerring bolts of magical force.

Name: Magic Stone
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Make ordinary stones into magical sling bullets that are especially dangerous to undead.

Name: Magic Weapon
Summary: Make a weapon temporarily magical.

Name: Magic's Vessel
Summary: A creature becomes a receptacle for pure magical energy sent by your deity.

Name: Mending
Summary: Repair one non-magical item.

Name: Message Rune
Summary: You record a message up to 5 minutes long and inscribe a special rune on any flat unattended surface within reach.

Name: Mindlink
Summary: Mentally impart 10 minutes' worth of information in an instant.

Name: Moonbeam
Summary: You shine a ray of moonlight.

Name: Mud Pit
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Conjure mud to slow movement.

Name: Necromancer's Generosity
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Heal your undead minion and protect it from positive energy.

Name: Needle of Vengeance
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: A long, jagged needle jabs into the target foe's psyche whenever it tries to attack a specifically forbidden creature.

Name: Negate Aroma
Summary: Suppress a creature’s scent.

Name: Nettleskin
Source: Threshold of Knowledge
Summary: Thorns sprout from your body; they pass through and don't damage any clothing or armor you wear.

Name: Noxious Vapors
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Form a toxic cloud that poisons and sickens.

Name: Nudge the Odds
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Cheat at gambling.

Name: Nymph's Token
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You grant an ally a token of favor.

Name: Oathkeeper's Insignia
Summary: A magical indicator assures a creature that you’ve upheld your end of a bargain.

Name: Object Memory
Summary: By touching an object, you draw forth the experience of those who created and used it.

Name: Object Reading
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Get psychic impressions from an object.

Name: Overstuff
Summary: Huge amounts of food and drink fill the target.

Name: Parch
Summary: Dry winds dehydrate a creature.

Name: Pass Without Trace
Summary: Make your tracks hard to find.

Name: Penumbral Shroud
Summary: You envelop the target in a shroud of shadow.

Name: Perfected Mind
Summary: You meditate upon perfection to remove all distractions from your mind.

Name: Personal Rain Cloud
Source: Pathfinder #151
Summary: You conjure a 5-foot-wide rain cloud that follows the target wherever it goes.

Name: Pest Form
Summary: Turn into a nonthreatening animal.

Name: Pet Cache
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Hide a familiar or animal companion in a pocket dimension.

Name: Phantom Pain
Summary: Cause a creature ongoing pain that sickens it.

Name: Phase Familiar
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You draw upon your patron's power to momentarily shift your familiar from its solid, physical form into an ephemeral version of itself shaped of mist.

Name: Physical Boost
Summary: You temporarily improve the target’s physique.

Name: Pocket Library
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Withdraw books from a pocket library for study.

Name: Practice Makes Perfect
Source: Pathfinder #148
Summary: Gain a bonus on a failed skill check, which may turn a failure into a success.

Name: Protection
Summary: Shield a creature against those of a chosen alignment.

Name: Protective Ward
Summary: You emanate a shimmering aura of protective magic.

Name: Protector Tree
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Conjure a tree that takes damage instead of adjacent allies.

Name: Protector's Sacrifice
Summary: You protect your ally by suffering in their stead.

Name: Pummeling Rubble
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Hurl a cone of rocks to batter creatures.

Name: Purify Food and Drink
Summary: Make beverages and meals safe.

Name: Purifying Icicle
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Summary: You evoke life essence into the form of water and freeze it, then launch the icicle at a foe.

Name: Pushing Gust
Summary: Giving the air a push, you buffet the target with a powerful gust of wind.

Name: Putrefy Food and Drink
Summary: You cause otherwise edible food to rot and spoil instantly, and water and other liquids to become brackish and undrinkable.

Name: Quick Sort
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Automatically sort many objects.

Name: Ray of Enfeeblement
Summary: Sap a creature's strength.

Name: Read Fate
Summary: You attempt to learn more about the target’s fate in the short term.

Name: Redact
Summary: You strike mention of a specific name from one or more documents.

Name: Rejuvenating Flames
Source: Pathfinder #168
Summary: You create a gout of flame that both heals and burns.

Name: Restyle
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Make permanent style changes to clothing.

Name: Rising Surf
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You create a wave of water that you ride, banking around obstacles and surfing to higher ground.

Name: Sanctuary
Summary: Protect a creature from being attacked.

Name: Savor the Sting
Summary: You inflict pain upon the target and revel in their anguish.

Name: Schadenfreude
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: React to your critical failure to distract foes with their exultation.

Name: Scholarly Recollection
Summary: Speaking a short prayer as you gather your thoughts, you’re blessed to find that your deity gave you just the right bit of information for your situation.

Name: Scouring Sand
Source: Pathfinder #151
Summary: You blast the area with grit that scours away soil and gets into creatures’ eyes.

Name: Seashell of Stolen Sound
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Copy a sound in a magical seashell.

Name: Sepulchral Mask
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You manifest a supernatural funerary mask, granting you a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws against emotion effects for 1 minute.

Name: Share Burden
Summary: You shoulder some of your ally’s pain.

Name: Share Lore
Summary: You share your knowledge with the touched creatures.

Name: Shattering Gem
Summary: A large gem floats around the target in an erratic pattern.

Name: Shielding Strike
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: As you attack a foe, warding magic transforms your momentum into action and lifts your shield.

Name: Shillelagh
Summary: Make a club or staff temporarily magical, and deal more damage to unnatural creatures.

Name: Shocking Grasp
Summary: Zap a creature with electricity.

Name: Shockwave
Summary: You create a wave of energy that ripples through the earth.

Name: Shooting Star
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You let loose a projectile that flies true and leaves the blazing trail of a meteor behind it.

Name: Sleep
Summary: Cause creatures in a small area to fall asleep.

Name: Snare Hopping
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You may not have placed your snare in the right place, but you can magically move it there.

Name: Snowball
Summary: You throw a magically propelled and chilled ball of dense snow.

Name: Soothe
Summary: Heal the target and bolster them against mental attacks.

Name: Soothing Words
Summary: You attempt to calm the target by uttering soothing words in a calm and even tone.

Name: Soul Siphon
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You siphon off a portion of the target's soul to bolster your own vitality.

Name: Spider Sting
Summary: Damage a creature and afflict it with spider venom.

Name: Spinning Staff
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You spin your staff with a twirling flourish, attacking two foes and transforming the momentum into magical energy to charge for your next Spellstrike.

Name: Spirit Link
Summary: Continually transfer your health to someone else.

Name: Splash of Art
Summary: A deluge of colorful illusory paint, tools, or other symbols of art and artisanship drift down in the area.

Name: Split the Tongue
Source: Pathfinder #161
Summary: The deceiving creature's tongue splits like a serpent's tongue.

Name: Spray of Stars
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You fling a spray of tiny shooting stars, dealing 1d4 fire damage.

Name: String of Fate
Summary: You bond yourself to a cherished friend, vowing to share their fate for good or for ill.

Name: Stumbling Curse
Summary: With a twist of a finger, you send a creature careening on a haphazard trajectory.

Name: Sudden Shift
Summary: You swiftly move from a dangerous spot and veil yourself.

Name: Summon Animal
Summary: Conjure an animal to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summon Construct
Summary: Conjure a construct to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summon Fey
Summary: Conjure a fey to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summon Lesser Servitor
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Summon a minor celestial, monitor, or fiend.

Name: Summon Plant or Fungus
Summary: Conjure a plant or fungus to fight on your behalf.

Name: Swampcall
Summary: You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess.

Name: Swarmsense
Summary: You extend your senses through a multitude of crawling and flying creatures.

Name: Sweet Dream
Summary: With soothing song or tales, you lull the target into an enchanting dream.

Name: Synchronize
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Place sigils on your targets that flash at a prespecified time.

Name: Synchronize Steps
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Summary: You link the minds of two targets, enabling them to move in tandem.

Name: Tempest Surge
Summary: You surround a foe in a swirling storm of violent winds, roiling clouds, and crackling lightning.

Name: Tempest Touch
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Your touch calls forth a churning mass of icy water that clings to your target, dealing 1d4 bludgeoning damage and 1d4 cold damage.

Name: Temporal Distortion
Summary: You share some of your own temporal distortions with a foe, altering their mind and body unpredictably as they're thrown backward or forward in time.

Name: Temporary Tool
Summary: You conjure a temporary simple tool, such as a shovel or rope into your hands.

Name: Tentacular Limbs
Summary: Your arms turn into long, pliable tentacles, increasing your reach when you’re delivering touch range spells and making unarmed Strikes with your arms.

Name: Tether
Summary: You use magical chains, vines, or other tethers to bind your target to you.

Name: Thicket of Knives
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Illusory copies of your weapon arm improve your ability to feint.

Name: Thoughtful Gift
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Teleport an item to an ally's grasp.

Name: Thunderous Strike
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You swing your massive weapon, creating a wave of sonic vibrations that topples creatures.

Name: Tidal Surge
Summary: You call forth a tremendous wave to move the target either in a body of water or on the ground.

Name: Touch of Corruption
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You infuse the target with negative energy.

Name: Touch of Obedience
Summary: Your imperious touch erodes the target’s willpower, making it easier to control.

Name: Touch of Undeath
Summary: You attack the target’s life force with undeath.

Name: True Strike
Summary: Make your next attack especially accurate.

Name: Undeath's Blessing
Summary: You instill within a creature the touch of the grave.

Name: Unfetter Eidolon
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time.

Name: Unimpeded Stride
Summary: Nothing can hold you in place.

Name: Unseen Servant
Summary: Create an invisible creature to help you.

Name: Updraft
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: A powerful blast of wind erupts from the ground, launching the target into the air and sending it crashing back down.

Name: Veil of Confidence
Summary: You surround yourself in a veil of confidence.

Name: Veil of Dreams
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You draw the target into a drowsy state, causing daydreams and sluggishness.

Name: Ventriloquism
Summary: Throw your voice.

Name: Verdant Sprout
Source: Pathfinder #151
Summary: You imbue a single ordinary, inexpensive plant seed with primal energy and throw it onto a surface, where it gradually sprouts into a Medium plant.

Name: Verminous Lure
Summary: Upon casting, the target emits a musk that's captivating to certain animals.

Name: Vibrant Thorns
Summary: Your body sprouts a coat of brambly thorns that harm those that strike you and thrive on life magic.

Name: Victory Cry
Summary: Your true might comes from your bonds with your allies, and you glory in their achievements.

Name: Waking Nightmare
Summary: You fill the creature’s mind with a terrifying vision out of its nightmares.

Name: Warped Terrain
Summary: You create illusory hazards that cover all surfaces in the area.

Name: Weapon Surge
Summary: Holding your weapon aloft, you fill it with divine energy.

Name: Wild Morph
Summary: You morph your body based on your training, choosing one of the following effects based on your wild order feats.

Name: Wild Shape
Summary: You infuse yourself with primal essence and transform yourself into another form.

Name: Wildfire
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: A thin layer of ash and flame covers the ground in the area.

Name: Winter Bolt
Summary: You fling a hollow icicle filled with winter’s wrath.

Name: Withering Grasp
Summary: Your touch rots organic material and decays objects.

Name: Word of Truth
Summary: You speak a statement you believe to be true and that is free of any attempt to deceive through twisting words, omission, and so on.

Name: Zenith Star
Summary: You call a tiny star to orbit a creature in a sparkling halo before shooting up into the heavens, where it marks the creature’s rough location.

Name: Acid Arrow
Summary: Magical arrow deals acid damage persistently.

Name: Animal Feature
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature, which you select from the list below each time you Cast the Spell.

Name: Animal Form
Summary: Turn into a dangerous animal.

Name: Animal Messenger
Summary: Send a Tiny animal to deliver a message.

Name: Animated Assault
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Temporarily animate small objects to attack creatures in an area.

Name: Animus Mine
Summary: You implant a mental mine within your psyche that detonates against anyone attempting to manipulate your thoughts.

Name: Ash Cloud
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Summon a cloud of hot ash and smoke.

Name: Augury
Summary: Predict whether a course of action brings good fortune.

Name: Barkskin
Summary: Target's skin is covered in protective bark.

Name: Befitting Attire
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Make clothes fit the occasion.

Name: Blistering Invective
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Light a creature on fire with the sheer viciousness of your words.

Name: Blood Duplicate
Summary: This spell deals you 1 piercing damage as you shape a magical duplicate of the target from your blood; you can't cast this spell if you don't have blood.

Name: Blood Vendetta
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Cause a creature that attacks you to start bleeding.

Name: Blur
Summary: Cause a target's form to become blurry and hard to hit.

Name: Bone Spray
Summary: You fire a torrent of jagged bone shards from your hands.

Name: Boneshaker
Summary: You reach out a hand and seize a creature's skeleton from afar, harming their body and potentially wrenching them by the bones to move them against their will.

Name: Brand the Impenitent
Summary: You brand the target with an ethereal copy of your deity’s religious symbol.

Name: Breath of Drought
Source: Pathfinder #151
Summary: You fill the area with an oppressive, arid swelter that overwhelms creatures with heat exhaustion.

Name: Calm Emotions
Summary: Suppress strong emotions and hostility.

Name: Charitable Urge
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Make a creature give away an object in its possession.

Name: Clawsong
Summary: You sing a fierce prayer, low and growling, and awaken the ancient spirit of a Terwa beast to guide and strengthen the target's unarmed blows.

Name: Comprehend Language
Summary: A creature understands one language.

Name: Continual Flame
Summary: A magical flame burns indefinitely.

Name: Create Food
Summary: Conjure food that can feed multiple creatures.

Name: Dancing Shield
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Summary: You levitate the touched shield and orbit it around a nearby ally.

Name: Darkness
Summary: Suppress all light in an area.

Name: Darkvision
Summary: See in the dark.

Name: Deafness
Summary: Make a creature deaf.

Name: Death Knell
Summary: Finish off a creature who's near death.

Name: Dismantle
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Temporarily disassemble an object into its components.

Name: Dispel Magic
Summary: End a spell or suppress an item's magic.

Name: Elemental Zone
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Make one element more damaging within a zone.

Name: Empathic Link
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Summary: You forge a bond between yourself and the target, enabling you to feel each other's emotions.

Name: Empty Pack
Summary: Make objects inside a container invisible

Name: Endure Elements
Summary: Protect a creature from severe cold or heat.

Name: Enhance Victuals
Summary: Improve food or drink and remove poisons.

Name: Enlarge
Summary: A creature grows in size.

Name: Entangle
Summary: Plants in an area grow to entangle and immobilize.

Name: Erase Trail
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Summary: You drastically reduce all signs of one specific creature's passage from the area, including footprints, handprints, dirt, and minor changes caused to the surrounding environment, like the bending of grass.

Name: Expeditious Excavation
Summary: You remove loose dirt, dust, gravel, sand, and the like from the area.

Name: Extract Poison
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Draw out poison from an object and make your next attack poisonous.

Name: Faerie Fire
Summary: Colorful light prevents creatures from being concealed or invisible.

Name: False Life
Summary: Gain temporary HP.

Name: Fear the Sun
Source: Pathfinder #172
Summary: You cause the creature's vision to become particularly sensitive.

Name: Feast of Ashes
Summary: You curse the target with a hunger no food can sate.

Name: Feral Shades
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: A cone of hound-shaped shades tear creatures apart.

Name: Final Sacrifice
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Channel energy to blow up your minion.

Name: Flame Wisp
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Fire wisps damage those you strike, and more grow if you cast fire spells.

Name: Flaming Sphere
Summary: A ball of fire rolls about at your command.

Name: Fungal Hyphae
Summary: Thin hyphae grow from your feet and plunge into the earth.

Name: Fungal Infestation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Plant poisonous fungal growths in a creature.

Name: Gentle Repose
Summary: A corpse doesn't decay and can't become undead.

Name: Ghoulish Cravings
Summary: Infect a creature with ghoul fever.

Name: Glitterdust
Summary: Sparkling dust breaks invisibility and impedes vision.

Name: Grave Impressions
Summary: You project a fragment of your senses into the corpse.

Name: Guiding Star
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Constellations nudge the target to travel to a location you choose.

Name: Heat Metal
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Make metal red hot.

Name: Hideous Laughter
Summary: Fits of laughter make a creature unable to take all its actions.

Name: Horrifying Blood Loss
Summary: You curse the target, filling it with terror at the loss of its blood.

Name: Humanoid Form
Summary: Take the shape of a humanoid.

Name: Hunter's Luck
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You have a preternatural ability to remember details about your foes.

Name: Ignite Fireworks
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Throw exploding fireworks.

Name: Illusory Creature
Summary: Form a convincing illusion of a creature.

Name: Imp Sting
Source: Pathfinder #160
Summary: You reproduce an imp's evil, poisonous sting, stabbing at an enemy and possibly affecting them with the devil's benumbing venom.

Name: Impart Empathy
Summary: You expand the target's ability to understand social cues that are normally beyond its comprehension.

Name: Impeccable Flow
Summary: You attune yourself to an underlying cosmic order to the world.

Name: Inner Radiance Torrent
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Gather spiritual energy to fire a storm of force bolts and beams.

Name: Instant Armor
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Set a contingency to return your armor to you.

Name: Invisibility
Summary: A creature can’t be seen until it attacks.

Name: Invoke the Crimson Oath
Summary: Unleash a blast of ruby light, striking all before you.

Name: Iron Gut
Summary: Your mouth, esophagus, and stomach become incredibly elastic and tougher than metal.

Name: Knock
Summary: Make a door, lock, or container easier to open, and possibly open it immediately.

Name: Lifelink Surge
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: You make a quick gesture, tracing the link between yourself and your eidolon and drawing on your connection to slowly strengthen your shared life force.

Name: Light of Revelation
Summary: Shed light, granting a bonus to Perception.

Name: Lock Item
Source: Knights of Lastwall
Summary: One object held by a creature becomes fused to that creature's hand and can't be put down.

Name: Loose Time's Arrow
Summary: Boost a group of creature's movement through time

Name: Lucky Number
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Set a contingency to reroll a specific, randomly chosen d20 result.

Name: Magic Mouth
Summary: Make an illusory mouth appear to speak a message.

Name: Magic Warrior Aspect
Summary: Gain the speed and senses of your totem animal.

Name: Magic Warrior Transformation
Summary: transform into your totem animal.

Name: Magnetic Attraction
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Pull items with magnetism, even disarming metal weapons.

Name: Magnetic Repulsion
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Push metal away, defending against metal weapons and armored foes.

Name: Mimic Undead
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Pretend to be undead.

Name: Mind Games
Summary: You lock minds with the target, trying to mentally subdue them.

Name: Mirror Image
Summary: Illusory duplicates of you cause attacks to miss.

Name: Misdirection
Summary: Cause one creature’s auras to appear to be another’s.

Name: Obscuring Mist
Summary: Conceal creatures in a cloud of mist.

Name: Pack Attack
Summary: You and one other target gain an uncanny coordination that helps you take down foes.

Name: Paranoia
Summary: Make a creature believe everyone is a threat.

Name: Penumbral Disguise
Source: Pathfinder #172
Summary: You wrap the target in shadows, granting them a +1 status bonus to Stealth checks to Hide while in dim light or darkness.

Name: Perfect Strike
Summary: Reroll a missed unarmed strike.

Name: Persistent Servant
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Summon a long-term unseen servant for a single task.

Name: Phantasmal Treasure
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Tempt a creature with an illusory reward.

Name: Phantom Crowd
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Create an illusory crowd that loudly agrees with you.

Name: Phantom Steed
Summary: Conjure a magical horse.

Name: Quench
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Put out fires and hurt fire creatures.

Name: Radiant Field
Source: Pathfinder #172
Summary: You create an area of bright light.

Name: Rapid Adaptation
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Adapt your companion or eidolon to your environment.

Name: Reaper's Lantern
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: A ghostly lantern diminishes healing for the living and weakens undead.

Name: Remove Fear
Summary: Free a creature from its fright.

Name: Remove Paralysis
Summary: Free a creature from paralysis.

Name: Resist Energy
Summary: Protect a creature from one type of energy damage.

Name: Restoration
Summary: Reduce a condition or lessen a toxin.

Name: Restore Senses
Summary: Remove a blinding or deafening effect.

Name: Rime Slick
Source: Pathfinder #151
Summary: You call down a chill wind.

Name: Scorching Ray
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Fire one to three rays of heat and flame at different foes.

Name: Sea Surge
Source: Pathfinder #151
Summary: You slap or stomp on a nearby solid or liquid surface, sending a surge of water rushing away from you.

Name: See Invisibility
Summary: See invisible creatures and objects.

Name: Shadow Zombie
Summary: You cast a shadow over the target zombie, briefly turning it into shadowy vapor and controlling its movement.

Name: Shape Wood
Summary: Reshape unworked wood as you choose.

Name: Shatter
Summary: Shatter an object with a high-frequency sonic attack.

Name: Shield Other
Summary: Absorb half the damage an ally would take.

Name: Shrink
Summary: Reduce a willing creature to Tiny size.

Name: Silence
Summary: Mute all sound from a creature.

Name: Slough Skin
Summary: You continually and harmlessly slough off the top layer of your skin while new skin regenerates immediately.

Name: Sonata Span
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Manifest a path with a tune.

Name: Soothing Mist
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You call forth a magical mist of positive energy that envelops a creature.

Name: Sound Burst
Summary: Damage and deafen creatures with a powerful din.

Name: Speak with Animals
Summary: Communicate with animals.

Name: Spectral Hand
Summary: Create a semicorporeal hand that touches creatures to target them with your spells.

Name: Spider Climb
Summary: Give a creature a climb Speed.

Name: Spirit Sense
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Find spirits and haunts.

Name: Spiritual Weapon
Summary: Materialize a deific weapon of force that appears and attacks repeatedly.

Name: Status
Summary: Keep track of a willing creature's location and well-being.

Name: Sudden Blight
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Decay living creatures and plants.

Name: Sudden Bolt
Source: Pathfinder #151
Summary: You call down a small bolt of lightning on the target

Name: Summon Elemental
Summary: Conjure an elemental to fight on your behalf.

Name: Summoner's Precaution
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Set a contingency to avoid being knocked out alongside your eidolon.

Name: Summoner's Visage
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Change your eidolon to cosmetically appear to be your identical twin.

Name: Sun Blade
Summary: Launch a bolt of divine sunfire.

Name: Swallow Light
Summary: You draw magical light into your open mouth, consuming it and turning its essence into fuel for a gout of life-draining shadows.

Name: Teeth to Terror
Summary: The target believes its teeth are falling out, crawling along its face, stabbing into its body, and cramming themselves down its throat.

Name: Telekinetic Maneuver
Summary: Disarm, Shove, or Trip a creature telekinetically.

Name: Thundering Dominance
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Make your companion or eidolon intimidating and let it emit a sonic roar.

Name: Timely Tutor
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Connect your eidolon or familiar to the Akashic Record to briefly grant it knowledge.

Name: Touch of Idiocy
Summary: Dull a target's mind with a touch.

Name: Tree Shape
Summary: Turn into a tree.

Name: Umbral Extraction
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Attempt to steal a spell slot.

Name: Umbral Mindtheft
Summary: You prepare to steal a broad field of knowledge from another creature, siphoning it from their mind and storing it in a pocket of the Shadow Plane connected to your own mind.

Name: Undetectable Alignment
Summary: Make a creature or object appear neutral to alignment detection.

Name: Vicious Jealousy
Summary: The target is overcome by deep jealousy and resentment that twists its mind against other creatures.

Name: Vision of Weakness
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You focus your gaze on a creature and gain a flash of divine insight into its nature.

Name: Vomit Swarm
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Vermin erupt in a cone from your mouth, biting and stinging creatures.

Name: Warrior's Regret
Source: Secrets of Magic
Summary: Regrets overcome a foe when they harm others.

Name: Water Breathing
Summary: Allow creatures to breathe underwater.

Name: Water Walk
Summary: Buoy a creature so it can walk on water.

Name: Web
Summary: Form a web that keeps creatures from moving.

Name: Wholeness of Body
Summary: You focus your ki to heal yourself.

Name: Worm's Repast
Summary: Gnawing worms materialize within the flesh of the target creature.

Name: Aberrant Whispers
Summary: You utter phrases in an unknown tongue, assaulting the minds of those nearby.

Name: Access Lore
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: You sift through the multiverse's divine knowledge, seeking out tidbits related to a particular subject.

Name: Agonizing Despair
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Mentally damage and frighten a creature.

Name: Ancestral Defense
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Summary: Your ancestor protects you against those who would bend your will.

Name: Angelic Wings
Summary: Wings of pure light spread out from your back, granting you a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Name: Animal Vision
Summary: Project your senses through an animal.
